titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18, United States Code, to make it a Federal Crime to steal a firearm or explosives in interstate or foreign commerce.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2427-2428)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to set penalties (a fine, up to ten years' imprisonment, or both) for the theft of a firearm or of explosive material in interstate or foreign commerce.
